Introduction
This topic contains information on handling pension and DIC cases following the remarriage of a surviving spouse, including
developing for a child’s entitlement after the surviving spouse’s remarriage or death
determining each child’s entitlement after the surviving spouse’s remarriage or death
handling apportioned awards after the surviving spouse’s remarriage or death
requesting information in pension or DIC cases
, and
determining
children’s entitlement in Old-Law or Section 306 Pension cases
continued entitlement to an apportionment
, and
entitlement for multiple children in DIC cases when the surviving spouse loses entitlement
.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E - Remarriage of a Surviving Spouse
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E
